title: Exploiting Feature and Class Relationships in Video Categorization with Regularized Deep Neural Networks
authors: YG Jiang, Z Wu, J Wang, X Xue, SF Chang - arXiv preprint arXiv: …
excerpt: Abstract: In this paper, we study the challenging problem of categorizing videos according to high-level semantics such as the existence of a particular human action or a complex event. Although extensive efforts have been devoted in recent years, most existing works  ...
